chart.searchString: index="_internal" source="*scheduler.log" "error savedsplunker" "No actions executed"| stats count by savedsearch_id | sort -count| rename savedsearch_id AS SavedsearchId
chart.title: Errors while executing saved searches - Last 24 Hours

chart.searchString: index=_internal source=*scheduler.log savedsplunker status=skipped | rename savedsearch_id AS SavedsearchId |stats count AS SkippedCount BY SavedsearchId | sort - SkippedCount
chart.title: Skipped Scheduled Search Executions - Last 24 Hours

chart.searchString: index=_internal source=*scheduler.log savedsplunker warn "max alive" | stats count AS SkippedCount BY savedsearch_id | sort - SkippedCount
chart.title: Execution Time > Execution Period - Last 24 Hours
